================
coopr.age images README
================

The images/icons used in coopr.age have been
obtained through the Open Icon Library


-------
License
-------

coopr.age is released as BSD.  See the LICENSE.txt file.

--------------------
Third Party Software
--------------------
Specific licenses for icons given below:

Oxygen Icons 4.3.1 (KDE) (oxygen)
        link: http://www.oxygen-icons.org/
        license: Dual: CC-BY-SA 3.0 or LGPL
        License link: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
                        http://creativecommons.org/licenses/LGPL/2.1/

arrow-right-3.png

        link: http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Crystal_Clear

configure.png

        link: http://art.gnome.org/
        license: GPLv2 
        license link: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/GPL/2.0/
